title: 22 Apps To Earn Gift Cards for Free
description: Do you want to find the best apps to earn gift cards for free? There are lots of apps that can help you do just that. These apps let you get rewards like free gift cards or cash for things you might already be doing, like shopping online, playing games, or taking surveys. Many of... The post 22 Apps To Earn Gift Cards for Free appeared first on Making Sense Of Cents.
author: Michelle Schroeder-Gardner
excerpt: Here are the best apps to earn gift cards for free. I have personally earned over $1,000 in free gift cards using these sites!
text: Do you want to find the best apps to earn gift cards for free? There are lots of apps that can help you do just that. These apps let you get rewards like free gift cards or cash for things you might already be doing, like shopping online, playing games, or taking surveys. Many of… Do you want to find the best apps to earn gift cards for free? There are lots of apps that can help you do just that. These apps let you get rewards like free gift cards or cash for things you might already be doing, like shopping online, playing games, or taking surveys. Many of these apps are free to use and only take a few minutes each day. You could earn gift cards for places like Amazon, Target, or Starbucks just by using your phone. I’ve personally earned over $1,000 in free gift cards using many of the apps listed below. It’s an easy way to save money and get free gift cards for popular stores and brands. Best Apps To Earn Gift Cards Here’s a quick list before we begin: Freecash Swagbucks Fetch Rewards InboxDollars MyPoints Rakuten Upside Honey Ibotta Ipsos iSay KashKick Survey Junkie Branded Surveys  Prime Opinion Scrambly Five Surveys HeyCash PrizeRebel Capital One Shopping Mistplay Shopkick Rewarded Play Below are the best apps to earn gift cards for free. Proof that I made money on the Freecash app. The $0.05 amounts were rewards for playing 2 minutes each day. The larger amounts like $40, $70, and $150 were for reaching certain levels. 1. Freecash Freecash is an app that lets you earn gift cards and money by doing fun tasks (and it’s also one of my favorite apps to earn gift cards for free by playing games). You can play games, try new apps, and answer surveys to get rewards. It’s easy to use and you just sign up and start doing activities. For each task you finish, you get coins. These coins can be turned into real money or gift cards. Many people use Freecash every day to make extra cash. Some offers can even pay over $300! I have personally made $302 just by playing a game on Freecash on my phone, and it only took one week. I turned it into free gift cards. When you’re ready to cash out, you have many choices. You can get PayPal money, gift cards for stores like Amazon, or even cryptocurrency. The best part is that you can get your rewards fast, usually on the same day you ask for them. Whenever I redeem my points, I almost always get the gift card delivered to me within seconds. Click here to sign up for Freecash. Recommended reading: Freecash Review – Is Freecash Legit? Proof that I’ve received over 100 free gift cards from Swagbucks. 2. Swagbucks Swagbucks is one of the best apps to earn gift cards, and you can use it on your computer or phone. It’s easy to sign up and start earning points called SB. I have personally earned over 110 free gift cards on Swagbucks over the years, so I know this is real! There are lots of ways to get points. You can take surveys, watch videos, play games, and shop online. Even searching the web can earn you points! When you have enough SB, you can trade them for gift cards. You can get gift cards to Amazon, Target, Walmart, Apple, or even PayPal cash. Sign up for Swagbucks here (and earn $5 in free bonus points). Recommended reading: Swagbucks Review – How Much Can You Earn On Swagbucks? Here’s a screenshot of the free gift cards I’ve earned from my personal Fetch Rewards app. 3. Fetch Rewards Fetch Rewards is a fun app that lets you earn gift cards by taking pictures of your receipts. It’s super easy to use and I use it for all of my grocery receipts every week! When you buy stuff at stores or restaurants, just take a photo of your receipt with your phone (you just open the Fetch app and it takes one quick moment to do). You’ll get points for each receipt you scan. You can scan receipts from all kinds of places – grocery stores, clothing shops, gas stations, and more. The more receipts you scan, the more points you earn. You can then trade these points for gift cards to popular stores like Amazon, Target, and Starbucks. Fetch Rewards is free to download and use. You don’t need to do anything special while shopping. Just buy what you normally would and scan the receipt after. You can earn extra points by buying certain products that Fetch features in the app. But you don’t have to buy those to get rewards because every receipt earns you points. You can sign up for Fetch Rewards by clicking here. Recommended reading: Fetch Rewards Review 4. InboxDollars InboxDollars is a popular app that lets you earn gift cards and cash rewards. You can make money by doing simple tasks on your phone or computer. The app has many ways to earn, such as taking surveys, watching videos, and playing games. You can also shop online and get cash back for your purchases. One nice feature is the ability to scan receipts for rewards. This means you can earn money from things you’re already buying. InboxDollars pays you in real cash, not just points. You can choose to get paid via PayPal or with gift cards. Sign up for InboxDollars here and get a free $5 bonus. 5. MyPoints MyPoints is a rewards program that gives you many ways to earn gift cards. You can get points by shopping online, buying groceries, taking surveys, and watching videos. When you collect enough points, you can trade them for gift cards. You can get free gift cards from popular places like Amazon, Target, Walmart, and Starbucks. The cards range from around $5 to $25. If you prefer cash, you can also get paid through PayPal. This gives you more freedom to use your rewards how you want. You can sign up for MyPoints by clicking here. 6. Rakuten Rakuten is a popular site that lets you earn cash back on your online purchases. It’s easy to use and can help you save money while shopping. I use Rakuten for almost all of my online purchases (I only don’t use it when I have simply forgotten!), and it has saved me a lot of money over the years. I recently got $90 in cash back from one online purchase, for example. When you shop through Rakuten, you get a percentage of your purchase back as cash. The app works with many well-known stores like Amazon, Walmart, and Target. To start earning, just download the Rakuten app and create an account. Then, browse the app for stores you want to shop at. Click on the store’s link in Rakuten before you start shopping. Rakuten tracks your purchases and adds cash back to your account. You can get your earnings as a check or through PayPal. Some stores even offer bonus cash back during special promotions. The app is free to use and doesn’t require any extra work. You just shop like normal and get money back, so it’s a simple way to save on things you’re already buying. Rakuten also has a browser extension for easier use on your computer. This reminds you to activate cash back when you visit partner stores online. I highly recommend downloading this so that you don’t miss out on easy cash back. Now, Rakuten doesn’t give free gift cards, but they give you straight cash back, such as via a check or PayPal, which is really nice! You can sign up for Rakuten here and get a $30 sign-up bonus. 7. Upside Upside is a handy app that helps you earn cash back on everyday purchases. You can get money back when you buy gas, groceries, or food from restaurants, but I find that most people mainly use this app for gas (which is what I do!). The app is free to download and easy to use. You can earn up to 25 cents per gallon on gas, and if you’re a new user, then there are typically deals for up to 90 cents cash back per gallon. When you’re ready to cash out, you have a few options. You can send the money right to your bank account or PayPal. Or you can choose gift cards from popular stores like Amazon and Walmart. Upside stands out because it gives you real cash, not just points. This makes it simple to use your earnings however you want. Plus, you’re saving money on things you already buy (nearly everyone buys gas!). You can sign up for Upside by clicking here. 8. Honey Honey is a free app that can help you save money when you shop online. It’s easy to use – just add it to your web browser. When you’re ready to buy something, Honey looks for discount codes for you. You don’t have to do anything extra. Honey finds the codes and puts them in your cart, so this can save you both time and money. Honey works with over 30,000 stores. You can use it at places like Macy’s, Lowe’s, and many more. It’s great for buying clothes, food, or even planning a trip. When you shop using Honey, you can earn rewards points. These points can be traded for gift cards to your favorite stores like Macy’s, Walmart, Gap, Sephora, Nordstrom, Target, DoorDash, Nike, and more. You can learn more about Honey by clicking here. 9. Ibotta Ibotta is a popular app that lets you earn cash back on your everyday purchases, like groceries. To get started with Ibotta, download the app and create an account. Then, browse through the available offers before you go grocery shopping. When you’re at the store, buy the items that have offers that you want to buy (of course, don’t buy things just because you’re getting a deal – you should actually want/need them!). After shopping, take a photo of your receipt and upload it to the app. Ibotta will match your purchases to the offers and give you cash back. For example, you might get 35 cents cash back on grapes, $3 cash back on diapers, $1 cash back on bread, and more. It’s kind of like getting a coupon on the items. Once you reach $20 in earnings, you can cash out. You can choose from gift cards (like Walmart, DoorDash, Home Depot, Lowe’s, T.J.Maxx, and more) or have the money sent to your bank account. Personally, I like to use both Fetch Rewards and Ibotta on all of my grocery shopping receipts – it is really easy to do. You can sign up for Ibotta by clicking here. 10. Ipsos iSay Ipsos iSay is a popular site that lets you earn gift cards by taking surveys. You can use it on your phone or computer to share your thoughts and get rewards. When you sign up, you’ll answer some questions about yourself. This helps Ipsos iSay find surveys that fit you best, then you’ll get emails when there are new surveys to take. The surveys ask about things like what you buy and what you like. They might show you ads and ask what you think. Your answers help companies make better products. You earn points for each survey you finish. The number of points depends on how long the survey is and surveys are usually around 5-30 minutes long. When you have enough points, you can trade them for gift cards. You can get gift cards from places like Amazon, Starbucks, and Target. If you prefer cash, you can choose PayPal instead. Some people even use their points to donate to charity. Please click here to sign up for Ipsos iSay and get a free 250 points for joining. 11. KashKick KashKick is an app where you can earn gift cards and cash for doing fun tasks. You can make money by taking surveys, playing games, and trying out new products. One fun thing about KashKick is that you can play popular games like Monopoly GO, Yahtzee, Bingo Blitz, and Wheel of Fortune to earn money. For example, you might get $30 for reaching a certain level in Monopoly within 8 days. KashKick also has lots of survey options. These usually take less than 20 minutes and can pay between $1 and $5 each. It’s an easy way to share your thoughts and make some extra cash. You can cash out your earnings through PayPal once you reach $10. Sign up for KashKick here. Recommended reading: KashKick Review: Is It Worth It? 12. Survey Junkie Survey Junkie is a popular app for earning gift cards by answering surveys. You can take surveys on your phone or computer. Each survey gives you points and these points can be turned into gift cards or cash. Survey Junkie has a low cash-out minimum where you only need $5 worth of points to get your reward. The app is free to join. It’s available for both Android and iPhone users. You can easily check for new surveys whenever you have free time. Sign up for Survey Junkie here. Recommended reading: Survey Junkie Review 13. Branded Surveys Branded Surveys is a fun way to make some extra cash. You can earn points by taking surveys about products and services. Each survey pays between 50 cents and $5, depending on how long it takes. You can cash out your points once you reach 500. That’s equal to $5. You can choose to get paid through PayPal or pick from over 100 gift card options like Amazon and Apple. The best part? You only need to be 16 years old to join, whereas most other survey sites require you to be 18. This makes Branded Surveys a great option for teens looking to earn some spending money. Sign up for Branded Surveys here and receive a free 100-point sign-up bonus. Recommended reading: Branded Surveys Review: How Much You Can Earn 14. Prime Opinion Prime Opinion is a survey website where you can earn money by sharing your thoughts. You can take surveys about everyday things like products, TV shows, and more. There are usually many surveys to choose from, so you can work whenever you want. I just logged in and I currently have 29 different surveys available for me to take, which is a lot! The site is easy to use on your phone or computer. You pick which surveys to do based on how long they take and how much they pay. Sometimes you might not qualify for a survey, but that’s normal. Just try another one. Prime Opinion pays you because companies want to know what you think; your opinions help them make better products. You can cash out your earnings through PayPal, bank transfer, or gift cards to places like Amazon and Target. Please click here to sign up for Prime Opinion and get up to a $5 free bonus (500 free bonus points). Recommended reading: Prime Opinion Review: How Much Does Prime Opinion Pay? 15. Scrambly Scrambly is a fun app that lets you earn gift cards by playing games and trying new apps. It’s easy to use and you can start earning rewards right away. The app has lots of games and other apps for you to try. You pick the ones you like and start playing. As you play, you earn coins. Some popular games they have available include Domino Dreams, Solitaire Smash, Dice Dreams, and Coin Master. I actually had 153 games available for me to play when I logged in, as well as over 10 different apps that I could download and try. Once you have enough coins, you can trade them for gift cards. You only need $1 worth of coins to get your first gift card. That’s pretty quick! Gift card options include Visa, Amazon, PayPal, Google Play, Apple, Spotify, and Walmart. Please click here to sign up for Scrambly. 16. Five Surveys Five Surveys is an easy way to make some extra money online. You can earn $5 for every five surveys you finish. It’s pretty simple to use. When you sign up, you’ll see lots of surveys ready for you to take. I logged in and currently have 23 surveys that I can take, ranging from 3 minutes to 42 minutes long (most were around 10-15 minutes long, though). The surveys ask about different things like what you buy, where you shop, and what you like to do. Don’t worry – the questions are easy to answer. You don’t need to be an expert on anything. One great thing about Five Surveys is that you can cash out quickly. Once you’ve done five surveys, you can get your $5. You can choose to get paid through PayPal, bank transfer, Venmo, or free gift cards (they have over 140 options). Please click here to sign up for Five Surveys. Recommended reading: Five Surveys Review 17. HeyCash HeyCash is an app where you can earn money and gift cards. You can make extra cash by doing fun tasks like taking surveys and trying new offers like playing games or downloading apps. As you complete tasks, you earn points. You can turn them into real money or gift cards when you’re ready. You can click here to sign up for HeyCash. 18. PrizeRebel PrizeRebel is a free website where you can earn gift cards and cash rewards. You can make money by taking surveys about products you use every day. When you finish surveys, you get points. You can trade these points for gift cards from popular stores like Amazon, Target, and Walmart. You can also get cash through PayPal. The surveys usually pay between 25 cents and $1 each. Some might pay more. PrizeRebel works with many research companies, so you’ll have lots of surveys to choose from. Sign up for PrizeRebel by clicking here. 19. Capital One Shopping Capital One Shopping is a free tool that helps you find deals and earn rewards on your online shopping. You can use Capital One Shopping as a browser extension or mobile app. When you shop, it looks for lower prices and coupon codes for you. This means you don’t have to search for deals yourself. The tool also lets you earn points on your purchases. You can trade these points for gift cards at many stores. Capital One Shopping is easy to use. Just add it to your browser or download the app on your phone. Then shop like normal. The tool works in the background to save you money. You can earn points on your purchases too. I have personally redeemed my Capital One Shopping points for free T.J.Maxx and Old Navy gift cards. They have many other options as well, such as REI, CVS Pharmacy, Chewy, Grubhub, and more. 20. Mistplay Mistplay is a free app that lets you earn gift cards by playing mobile games. When you download Mistplay, you’ll see a list of games to choose from, such as word puzzles, strategy games, and even classic games like Solitaire. Pick ones that look interesting to you and start playing. The more you play, the more units you earn in the app. These units can be traded for gift cards to places like Amazon, Google Play, and PayPal. Mistplay offers different types of games. You might find word puzzles, strategy games, or even old favorites like Solitaire. 21. Shopkick Shopkick is an app that lets you earn gift cards while shopping. You can get rewards for things you already do, like walking into stores or buying stuff. The app gives you points called “kicks” for different actions. You can earn kicks by scanning product barcodes in stores. You can also get kicks for watching videos or checking out online offers. When you shop at partner stores, you can earn even more kicks. Just link your credit card to the app. Then you’ll get points when you make purchases at those places. Shopkick works with lots of popular stores. These include Target, Walmart, and Best Buy. You can also earn kicks at grocery stores and restaurants. Once you have enough kicks, you can trade them for gift cards. You can choose from many stores like Amazon, Starbucks, or Target. 22. Rewarded Play Rewarded Play is an app that lets you earn gift cards by playing games on your phone. It’s available for Android users in the U.S. and Canada. The app has a big selection of games to choose from. You can find strategy, puzzle, word, and card games, so there’s something for everyone! To start earning, just download the app and pick a game you like. Play the game and you’ll collect points. Once you have enough points, you can trade them for gift cards. You can get gift cards from popular stores like Amazon and Walmart. Frequently Asked Questions Below are answers to common questions about the best apps to earn gift cards. Are free gift card apps legit? Yes, many free gift card apps are legit. They make money from ads and partnerships. Then they share some of that money with you as points that you can turn into free gift cards. How do free gift card apps work? These apps give you points for doing tasks. You might take surveys, watch videos, or play games. When you have enough points, you can trade them for gift cards. Some apps also give you cash back when you shop at certain stores. What is the best app to earn a gift card? I think some of the best apps to earn a gift card for free include Freecash, Swagbucks, and Fetch Rewards. You can take surveys, watch videos, and shop to earn points, which are easy things to do. Can I really earn gift cards by playing games? What is the best app to earn gift cards playing games? Yes, you can earn gift cards by playing games on some apps. These games are usually simple and easy to play. You might need to reach certain levels or play for a set time to earn rewards. I think the best app to earn gift cards by playing games is Freecash, and I have personally made over $300 in free gift cards by playing games on Freecash. What are the best apps to earn gift cards on Android? Android users have many choices for gift card apps. Swagbucks, Fetch Rewards, and Freecash work well on Android phones. These apps are free to download from the Google Play Store. What are the best apps to earn gift cards on the iPhone? iPhone users can earn gift cards with apps. Swagbucks and Fetch Rewards are top choices for iOS. InboxDollars and Freecash also have iPhone apps that work well. You can find these in the App Store. Best Apps To Earn Gift Cards – Summary I hope you enjoyed my article on the best apps to earn gift cards for free. If you want to earn free gift cards, there are many apps that can make it easy and fun to do so. Whether you’re shopping, playing games, or taking surveys, these apps reward you for things you’re already doing. Many of them are free to use and only take a few minutes of your time each day. Some of the most popular apps include Swagbucks, Fetch Rewards, and Freecash. Each one offers different tasks, from scanning receipts to completing fun challenges, making it simple to turn your spare time into real rewards. In summary, earning free gift cards through apps is not only possible – I’ve done it myself! By using apps like Swagbucks and Fetch Rewards, I’ve earned over $1,000 in free gift cards. With just a few minutes each day, you can start collecting rewards and save money on everything from groceries to clothes, or even food delivery. Give it a try – you’ll be amazed at how fast the rewards add up! What are your favorite apps to earn gift cards for free? Recommended reading: 13 Ways To Get Free Visa Gift Cards 15 Ways To Get Free Starbucks Gift Cards And Coffee 15 Ways To Get Free Walmart Gift Cards 12 Easy Ways To Earn Free Amazon Gift Cards 13 Ways To Get Free Apple Gift Cards 17 Ways To Get Free Target Gift Cards 12 Best Online Surveys For Gift Cards 9 Best Ways To Find Free Gas Cards
html:
Do you want to find the best apps to earn gift cards for free? There are lots of apps that can help you do just that. These apps let you get rewards like free gift cards or cash for things you might already be doing, like shopping online, playing games, or taking surveys. Many of…

Do you want to find the best apps to earn gift cards for free?

There are lots of apps that can help you do just that. These apps let you get rewards like free gift cards or cash for things you might already be doing, like shopping online, playing games, or taking surveys.

Many of these apps are free to use and only take a few minutes each day. You could earn gift cards for places like Amazon, Target, or Starbucks just by using your phone.

I’ve personally earned over $1,000 in free gift cards using many of the apps listed below. It’s an easy way to save money and get free gift cards for popular stores and brands.

Best Apps To Earn Gift Cards

Here’s a quick list before we begin:

  • Freecash
  • Swagbucks
  • Fetch Rewards
  • InboxDollars
  • MyPoints
  • Rakuten
  • Upside
  • Honey
  • Ibotta
  • Ipsos iSay
  • KashKick
  • Survey Junkie
  • Branded Surveys 
  • Prime Opinion
  • Scrambly
  • Five Surveys
  • HeyCash
  • PrizeRebel
  • Capital One Shopping
  • Mistplay
  • Shopkick
  • Rewarded Play

Below are the best apps to earn gift cards for free.

1. Freecash

Freecash is an app that lets you earn gift cards and money by doing fun tasks (and it’s also one of my favorite apps to earn gift cards for free by playing games). You can play games, try new apps, and answer surveys to get rewards.

It’s easy to use and you just sign up and start doing activities. For each task you finish, you get coins. These coins can be turned into real money or gift cards.

Many people use Freecash every day to make extra cash. Some offers can even pay over $300!

I have personally made $302 just by playing a game on Freecash on my phone, and it only took one week. I turned it into free gift cards.

When you’re ready to cash out, you have many choices. You can get PayPal money, gift cards for stores like Amazon, or even cryptocurrency. The best part is that you can get your rewards fast, usually on the same day you ask for them. Whenever I redeem my points, I almost always get the gift card delivered to me within seconds.

Click here to sign up for Freecash.

Recommended reading: Freecash Review – Is Freecash Legit?

2. Swagbucks

Swagbucks is one of the best apps to earn gift cards, and you can use it on your computer or phone. It’s easy to sign up and start earning points called SB.

I have personally earned over 110 free gift cards on Swagbucks over the years, so I know this is real!

There are lots of ways to get points. You can take surveys, watch videos, play games, and shop online. Even searching the web can earn you points!

When you have enough SB, you can trade them for gift cards. You can get gift cards to Amazon, Target, Walmart, Apple, or even PayPal cash.

Sign up for Swagbucks here (and earn $5 in free bonus points).

Recommended reading: Swagbucks Review – How Much Can You Earn On Swagbucks?

3. Fetch Rewards

Fetch Rewards is a fun app that lets you earn gift cards by taking pictures of your receipts. It’s super easy to use and I use it for all of my grocery receipts every week!

When you buy stuff at stores or restaurants, just take a photo of your receipt with your phone (you just open the Fetch app and it takes one quick moment to do). You’ll get points for each receipt you scan.

You can scan receipts from all kinds of places – grocery stores, clothing shops, gas stations, and more.

The more receipts you scan, the more points you earn. You can then trade these points for gift cards to popular stores like Amazon, Target, and Starbucks.

Fetch Rewards is free to download and use. You don’t need to do anything special while shopping. Just buy what you normally would and scan the receipt after.

You can earn extra points by buying certain products that Fetch features in the app. But you don’t have to buy those to get rewards because every receipt earns you points.

You can sign up for Fetch Rewards by clicking here.

Recommended reading: Fetch Rewards Review

4. InboxDollars

InboxDollars is a popular app that lets you earn gift cards and cash rewards. You can make money by doing simple tasks on your phone or computer.

The app has many ways to earn, such as taking surveys, watching videos, and playing games. You can also shop online and get cash back for your purchases.

One nice feature is the ability to scan receipts for rewards. This means you can earn money from things you’re already buying.

InboxDollars pays you in real cash, not just points. You can choose to get paid via PayPal or with gift cards.

Sign up for InboxDollars here and get a free $5 bonus.

5. MyPoints

MyPoints is a rewards program that gives you many ways to earn gift cards. You can get points by shopping online, buying groceries, taking surveys, and watching videos.

When you collect enough points, you can trade them for gift cards. You can get free gift cards from popular places like Amazon, Target, Walmart, and Starbucks. The cards range from around $5 to $25.

If you prefer cash, you can also get paid through PayPal. This gives you more freedom to use your rewards how you want.

You can sign up for MyPoints by clicking here.

6. Rakuten

Rakuten is a popular site that lets you earn cash back on your online purchases. It’s easy to use and can help you save money while shopping.

I use Rakuten for almost all of my online purchases (I only don’t use it when I have simply forgotten!), and it has saved me a lot of money over the years. I recently got $90 in cash back from one online purchase, for example.

When you shop through Rakuten, you get a percentage of your purchase back as cash. The app works with many well-known stores like Amazon, Walmart, and Target.

To start earning, just download the Rakuten app and create an account. Then, browse the app for stores you want to shop at. Click on the store’s link in Rakuten before you start shopping.

Rakuten tracks your purchases and adds cash back to your account. You can get your earnings as a check or through PayPal. Some stores even offer bonus cash back during special promotions.

The app is free to use and doesn’t require any extra work. You just shop like normal and get money back, so it’s a simple way to save on things you’re already buying.

Rakuten also has a browser extension for easier use on your computer. This reminds you to activate cash back when you visit partner stores online. I highly recommend downloading this so that you don’t miss out on easy cash back.

Now, Rakuten doesn’t give free gift cards, but they give you straight cash back, such as via a check or PayPal, which is really nice!

You can sign up for Rakuten here and get a $30 sign-up bonus.

7. Upside

Upside is a handy app that helps you earn cash back on everyday purchases. You can get money back when you buy gas, groceries, or food from restaurants, but I find that most people mainly use this app for gas (which is what I do!).

The app is free to download and easy to use. You can earn up to 25 cents per gallon on gas, and if you’re a new user, then there are typically deals for up to 90 cents cash back per gallon.

When you’re ready to cash out, you have a few options. You can send the money right to your bank account or PayPal. Or you can choose gift cards from popular stores like Amazon and Walmart.

Upside stands out because it gives you real cash, not just points. This makes it simple to use your earnings however you want. Plus, you’re saving money on things you already buy (nearly everyone buys gas!).

You can sign up for Upside by clicking here.

8. Honey

Honey is a free app that can help you save money when you shop online. It’s easy to use – just add it to your web browser. When you’re ready to buy something, Honey looks for discount codes for you.

You don’t have to do anything extra. Honey finds the codes and puts them in your cart, so this can save you both time and money.

Honey works with over 30,000 stores. You can use it at places like Macy’s, Lowe’s, and many more. It’s great for buying clothes, food, or even planning a trip.

When you shop using Honey, you can earn rewards points. These points can be traded for gift cards to your favorite stores like Macy’s, Walmart, Gap, Sephora, Nordstrom, Target, DoorDash, Nike, and more.

You can learn more about Honey by clicking here.

9. Ibotta

Ibotta is a popular app that lets you earn cash back on your everyday purchases, like groceries.

To get started with Ibotta, download the app and create an account. Then, browse through the available offers before you go grocery shopping.

When you’re at the store, buy the items that have offers that you want to buy (of course, don’t buy things just because you’re getting a deal – you should actually want/need them!). After shopping, take a photo of your receipt and upload it to the app. Ibotta will match your purchases to the offers and give you cash back.

For example, you might get 35 cents cash back on grapes, $3 cash back on diapers, $1 cash back on bread, and more. It’s kind of like getting a coupon on the items.

Once you reach $20 in earnings, you can cash out. You can choose from gift cards (like Walmart, DoorDash, Home Depot, Lowe’s, T.J.Maxx, and more) or have the money sent to your bank account.

Personally, I like to use both Fetch Rewards and Ibotta on all of my grocery shopping receipts – it is really easy to do.

You can sign up for Ibotta by clicking here.

10. Ipsos iSay

Ipsos iSay is a popular site that lets you earn gift cards by taking surveys. You can use it on your phone or computer to share your thoughts and get rewards.

When you sign up, you’ll answer some questions about yourself. This helps Ipsos iSay find surveys that fit you best, then you’ll get emails when there are new surveys to take.

Frequently Asked Questions

Below are answers to common questions about the best apps to earn gift cards.

Are free gift card apps legit?

Yes, many free gift card apps are legit. They make money from ads and partnerships. Then they share some of that money with you as points that you can turn into free gift cards.

How do free gift card apps work?

These apps give you points for doing tasks. You might take surveys, watch videos, or play games. When you have enough points, you can trade them for gift cards. Some apps also give you cash back when you shop at certain stores.

What is the best app to earn a gift card?

I think some of the best apps to earn a gift card for free include Freecash, Swagbucks, and Fetch Rewards. You can take surveys, watch videos, and shop to earn points, which are easy things to do.

Can I really earn gift cards by playing games? What is the best app to earn gift cards playing games?

Yes, you can earn gift cards by playing games on some apps. These games are usually simple and easy to play. You might need to reach certain levels or play for a set time to earn rewards. I think the best app to earn gift cards by playing games is Freecash, and I have personally made over $300 in free gift cards by playing games on Freecash.

What are the best apps to earn gift cards on Android?

Android users have many choices for gift card apps. Swagbucks, Fetch Rewards, and Freecash work well on Android phones. These apps are free to download from the Google Play Store.

What are the best apps to earn gift cards on the iPhone?

iPhone users can earn gift cards with apps. Swagbucks and Fetch Rewards are top choices for iOS. InboxDollars and Freecash also have iPhone apps that work well. You can find these in the App Store.

Best Apps To Earn Gift Cards – Summary

I hope you enjoyed my article on the best apps to earn gift cards for free.

If you want to earn free gift cards, there are many apps that can make it easy and fun to do so. Whether you’re shopping, playing games, or taking surveys, these apps reward you for things you’re already doing. Many of them are free to use and only take a few minutes of your time each day.

Some of the most popular apps include Swagbucks, Fetch Rewards, and Freecash. Each one offers different tasks, from scanning receipts to completing fun challenges, making it simple to turn your spare time into real rewards.

In summary, earning free gift cards through apps is not only possible – I’ve done it myself! By using apps like Swagbucks and Fetch Rewards, I’ve earned over $1,000 in free gift cards. With just a few minutes each day, you can start collecting rewards and save money on everything from groceries to clothes, or even food delivery. Give it a try – you’ll be amazed at how fast the rewards add up!
